summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3548, for the improvement of West 62nd Street from 20th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44678, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
